style.title: Style
style.description: Currently we support __*numpy*__ style, based on [A Guide to NumPy/SciPy Documentation](https://github.com/numpy/numpy/blob/master/doc/HOWTO_DOCUMENT.rst.txt), __*google*__ style, based on [Google Python Style Guide](http://google.github.io/styleguide/pyguide.html), __*sphinx*__ style, based on [an example from their documentation](http://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/restructuredtext/domains.html#info-field-lists), and __*epytext*__ style, based on the [official documentation](http://epydoc.sourceforge.net/manual-epytext.html).
